summary: Not respecting the Jarls is now a crime!
descriptionHtml:
I always found it strange that sitting on a Jarl\'s throne was not considered as a crime.
Now, with this mod installed, whenever you sit on a Jarl\'s throne, the nearest guard will come to you and ask you to move on. If you don\'t, they will try to arrest you; if you do not answer or if you resist, they will attack you.

[youtube]TyhjvjWgqmg[/youtube]
author: Sagittarius22
